 Representation of cross product based on ordered pair component functions.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2006.)
statement:
xp2 $p |- ( A X. B ) = { x e. ( _V X. _V ) | ( ( 1st ` x ) e. A /\ ( 2nd ` x ) e. B ) } $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
